ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Trim the reply lengths a little please
ygData.msgSnippet: NP :)  I usually just keep the meat of the thread on it, so when people read the message they know what I m talking about :) Tinik Gutenungrie Gnomish
ygData.messageBody:
NP :) I usually just keep the meat of the thread on it, so when people read
the message they know what I'm talking about :)

Tinik Gutenungrie
Gnomish Enchanter, Veeshan

----- Original Message -----
From: "J.Tully" <jtully@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, June 22, 2000 7:55 PM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] Trim the reply lengths a little please


> Sorry to request, but could you folks trim up the reply lengths a tad?
Some
> folks are posting to the list and it's not appending a symbol infront of
> reply sections... so it's hard to tell what's new and what's old without a
> LOT of re-reading (becuase the last digest message I got was WAY longer
than
> it would have been with some selective reply trimming).
>
> This would help tons, thanks all. If ya don't wanna, don't worry. Just a
> request. =)
>
> Tuni Gearspinner
> 45th Mage, and Gnome Extraordinare.
> Karana Server
